parts.text:
```json
{
  "attractions": [
    {
      "Name": "Tokyo Imperial Palace",
      "Description": "The primary residence of the Emperor of Japan. It is built on the former site of Edo Castle and features beautiful gardens and historic buildings.",
      "Best Time to Visit": "Any time of year; guided tours available.",
      "Entry Fee": "Free (for East Garden and outer areas; guided tours of the inner palace require advance application)",
      "Location": "1-1 Chiyoda, Chiyoda City, Tokyo 100-8111, Japan",
      "Representative Image URL": "https://www.japan-guide.com/g18/3011_01.jpg"
    },
    {
      "Name": "Imperial Palace East Garden",
      "Description": "Part of the Tokyo Imperial Palace area, open to the public. Features historic ruins, gardens, and museums.",
      "Best Time to Visit": "Spring (cherry blossoms) or Autumn (foliage).",
      "Entry Fee": "Free",
      "Location": "1-1 Chiyoda, Chiyoda City, Tokyo 100-8111, Japan",
      "Representative Image URL": "https://www.japan-guide.com/g18/3011_02.jpg"
    },
    {
      "Name": "Kitanomaru Garden (Imperial Palace North Side)",
      "Description": "A public park located on the north side of the Imperial Palace, offering green space and historical monuments.",
      "Best Time to Visit": "Any time of year.",
      "Entry Fee": "Free",
      "Location": "1-1 Kitanomarukoen, Chiyoda City, Tokyo 102-0091, Japan",
      "Representative Image URL": "https://www.japan-guide.com/g18/3011_07.jpg"
    },
    {
      "Name": "Akasaka Palace (State Guest House)",
      "Description": "A European-style palace used for welcoming state guests. Guided tours are available.",
      "Best Time to Visit": "During public viewing periods.",
      "Entry Fee": "Varies depending on the tour or viewing.",
      "Location": "2-1-1 Akasaka, Minato City, Tokyo 107-0051, Japan",
      "Representative Image URL": "https://www.japan-guide.com/g18/3014_01.jpg"
    },
    {
      "Name": "Imperial Palace Outer Garden",
      "Description": "The outer garden of the Imperial Palace offers a scenic view of the palace and surrounding greenery, featuring wide lawns and walking paths.",
      "Best Time to Visit": "Any time of year.",
      "Entry Fee": "Free",
      "Location": "1-1 Chiyoda, Chiyoda City, Tokyo 100-8111, Japan",
      "Representative Image URL": "https://i.imgur.com/example_imperial_outer_garden.jpg"
    }
  ]
}
```
